name: It's Rollin True
description:
It's Rolling True

3D Platformer with obstacles

This is the first game my crew and me have ever made.

We have never done any programming before or worked in Unity

Had 2 days to come up with a game and this is what we made

Thanks GameJam

This is the TRUE version of It's Rollin, with slight tweeks to the camara position and with ingame player controller descriptions
